name: Order & Chaos
description: The code creates a grid of squares that each contain lines drawn in random locations inside the squares. The concept is to combine a sense of order with a sense of randomness and generate an interesting design. The square and lines are created using random sequences and loops.

name: Orbiting Points
description: This code makes a grid of squares filled with random circles. The idea is to create a changing pattern by adding rotation to each square. It uses loops, random choices, and rotation to build the design.

name: Rhythmic Triads
description: This code draws a grid of triangles that change size and shape using noise. The idea is to create a flowing, wave-like pattern. It uses loops, noise, and simple geometry to make the design move.

name: Flowing Lines
description: This code draws wavy lines using noise, starting with a horizontal line and then adding rotated diagonal ones. The idea is to explore movement and variation through noise and rotation. It uses shapes, transformations, and noise to create the pattern.

name: Whispers in the Flow
description: This code creates many agents that move across the canvas, following invisible flow field directions. The idea is to show movement and patterns as agents interact with the field. It uses noise, vectors, and random colors to make the animation dynamic.

name: Sparks of Midnight
description: This code creates glowing fire-like particles that burst outward when you click anywhere on the screen. The idea is to mimic sparks or small explosions of light, blending randomness with motion. It uses particles with size, lifespan, and velocity to form fiery bursts, inviting the viewer to interact and create their own sparks.

name: Sound Waves in Motion
description: This code draws a shifting grid of triangles that move with noise and pairs the visuals with sound. The idea is to connect visuals and music, letting patterns flow while random notes play. By clicking anywhere on the screen, the viewer triggers both the animation and a musical note, making the experience interactive.
